contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Government agency |agency_name = <small>Palestinian National Authority</small> <br> Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics (PCBS) |nativename = <big>'''الجهاز المركزي للإحصاء الفلسطيني'''</big> |nativename_a = |nativename_r = |logo = |logo_width = |logo_caption = |jurisdiction = |headquarters = [[Ramallah]] {{flagicon|Palestine}} |coordinates = |chief1_name = [[Salam Fayyad]] |chief1_position = Head of Advisory Council |chief2_name = [[Ola Awad]] |chief2_position = President |chief3_name = |chief3_position = |parent_agency = |child1_agency = |child2_agency = |website = http://pcbs.gov.ps/ }} {{Politics of Palestine}} The '''Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics''' (PCBS or '''"PalStat"''') ({{lang-ar|الجهاز المركزي للإحصاء الفلسطيني}}) is the statistical organization under the umbrella of the Palestinian Cabinet of the [[Palestinian National Authority]]. Since December 2012, it has been officially designated under the authority of the [[State of Palestine]]. ==History== The PCBS was established in 1993 by decision of the [[PLS Executive Committee]]. It carried out its first full census of the [[West Bank]] and [[Gaza Strip]] in 1997. Despite considerable Israeli obstruction (see [[Nigel Parsons]] (2005): ''The Politics of the Palestinian Authority'' pp.200-201), the PCBS was able to arrange the voter registration for the [[Palestinian general election, 1996]]. As well as providing statistics on the [[retail price index]] and other things one might expect in any country, the PCBS also provides statistics tailored to the particular issues faced by Palestinians in the West Bank and Gaza Strip, such as their 2003 "Survey on the Impact of separation Wall on the Location Where it Passed Through". ==Presidents== * [[Dr. Hasan Abu Libdeh]] (1993-2005) * [[Dr. Luay Shabeneh]] (2005-2010) * [[Ola Awad]] (2011-present) ==External links== *[http://pcbs.gov.ps Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics] *[http://www.pcbs.gov.ps/Portals/_pcbs/populati/popu_list.aspx Small Area Populations, Revised Estimates 2004-2006] [[Category:Palestinian politics]] [[Category:Palestinian National Authority]] [[Category:State of Palestine]] [[Category:National statistical services|Palestine]] {{Palestine-stub}}
